tool_description: Calculates nutrient density scores and ratios to evaluate the nutritional quality and efficiency of a recipe per calorie.
error_messages: Invalid nutritional values: All nutritional values must be non-negative numbers.
Zero calories detected: Cannot calculate nutrient density with zero calories per serving.
Extreme values detected: Some nutritional values appear unusually high or low. Verify input accuracy.
usage: Input per-serving nutritional values. Returns various nutrient density metrics and quality scores to assess nutritional efficiency.

density_percentile.description: Percentile ranking compared to typical foods
